original_text:
My people are determined to turn from me.
    Even though they call me God Most High,
    I will by no means exalt them.
korean_text: 내 백성이 끝끝내 내게서 물러가나니 비록 그들을 불러 위에 계신 이에게로 돌아오라 할지라도 일어나는 자가 하나도 없도다

sentences.original_text: My people are determined to turn from me.
Even though they call me God Most High,
I will by no means exalt them.
